casebody.data:
Marc Sheldon v. Zoning and Planning Commission of the Town of Warren Jeffrey B. Sienkiewicz, in support of the petition. Reginald W. H. Fairbairn, in opposition. Reginald W. H. Fairbairn, in support of the petition. Jeffrey B. Sienkiewicz, in opposition. Submitted October 17 decided November 1, 1977 Submitted October 17

decided November 1, 1977

The defendant’s petition for certification for appeal from the Court of Common Pleas in Litchfield County is denied by the court.

The plaintiff’s petition for certification for appeal from the Court of Common Pleas in Litchfield County is denied by the court.
